post: A look back on the term
content: What did everyone think of the class? I had a lot of fun designing webpages!
author: Bill Nye

replies.reply: This was a great class! Tbh I was hoping for spiders though...
replies.author: Andy

replies.reply: I still have questions about flex boxes! do the boxes need to hit the gym for a few weeks first?
replies.author: James

replies.reply:
All of this feedback is great! I would also really appreciate if
          you all could follow my sinsta: There's a lot of sick hacking stuff I do there!
replies.author: Rob

replies.reply: I didn't like it when Rob kept calling me 'dee-NICE' but it was a lot of fun
replies.author: Denise

content: Hey everyone! I decided to waive lecture today. who wants to go get pizza tonight at American Dream?
author: Bill Nye

replies.reply: Hell yeah!
replies.author: Nicholas

replies.reply: Is this why you're the favorite?

replies.reply: Count me in!

replies.reply: What time?
replies.author: Nani

content: Does anyone have any feedback for me? How could the class be made better for future terms?
author: Bill Nye

replies.reply: Literally be Rob Hess

replies.reply: Okay, I get it, Rob is the favorite. Any real feedback?

content: Hey! I heard about this other class called Web Dev, cs290. Has anyone taken it? What did you think?

replies.reply: The final was rough, kinda unfair tbh!
